result.title: Run4Life modelling: mass and energy balances
result.description: Steadystate models considering the balances at the different demosites In order to assess the efficiency of the nutrient recovery systems the mass balances will be applied to different parameters COD N P and some target micropollutants

result.title: Technology Evidence Base initial version
result.description: This deliverable is a data base summarizing the results of the various NextGen solutions for circular water services. Target groups are municipalities, operator and consulting companies, which will be able to use the Technology Evidence Base within decisions making processes for more circular water management schemes.
